thread.title: Volkswagen Emissions Investigations Should Widen to Entire Auto Industry, Officials Say
thread.title_full: Volkswagen Emissions Investigations Should Widen to Entire Auto Industry, Officials Say - WSJ

author: William Boston
title: Volkswagen Emissions Investigations Should Widen to Entire Auto Industry, Officials Say
text:
BERLIN—Investigations into Volkswagen AG’s alleged manipulation of U.S. emissions tests should widen to include the entire auto industry, German and French officials said Tuesday, as regulators begin to ponder whether such trickery is more widespread.
Concerns that the scandal could lead to broader damage for the industry hit the shares of car companies across Europe on Tuesday, with Volkswagen’s stock down another 5% after dropping... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
